title: Chapter 1853 - Karmic Backlash
body:
Chapter 1853 - Karmic Backlash

The Magnetic Origin Light swept throughout heaven and earth.

Su Yi gripped the Crescent Moon Blade and blocked its onslaught head-on.

There was no denying it. This Epoch Treasure was quite something, but it was still inferior to the Book of Karma. It was far less useful for blocking Magnetic Origin Light.

The golden fishing rod in Gu Yunchan’s hands was obviously an Epoch Treasure capable of blocking Magnetic Origin Light too.

Qing Wu had lashed out at him before she died, injuring him badly. His flesh was in tatters, but now, his wounds knit back together at shocking speeds.

“Alas, all your efforts were in vain.” Gu Yunchan flipped his hand, and the Book of Karma floated into the air. “The Mystery of Chaos has fallen into my hands, and you… have nowhere left to run!”

“Is that so?” asked Su Yi. “Why not attack, then?”

He could tell that Gu Yunchan was stalling for time, both to heal his wounds and to probe the extent of Su Yi’s abilities!

Gu Yunchan smiled, his gaze heavy and his eyes glinting with imposing light. “Don’t be in such a rush. I’d like to chat before I kill you.”

“What would you like to chat about?”...
